abstract: Make Melissa Clark’s latest, a beautiful, crisp-skinned Parmesan coated bird, and settle in with Alan Richman’s profile of the great chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten.
lead_paragraph: Good morning. Melissa Clark came in this week with a beautiful new recipe for crisp-skinned Parmesan-rosemary roast chicken (above). My guess? It’s all anyone in your set will be talking about in coming days. I think you’ll want to make it tonight, or on some evening very soon. Go to!
